Additional notes
The Band reunited for some show in 2007 celebrating the 20th Aniversary - ``Acero y Sangre``, first LP. In this reunion they haven&#039;t ``Largo`` guitarrist, then they chose the young guitarrist Alex Escorza from Crienium.
